CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
CurrentVersion.description: Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
OldVersion.description: Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Microsoft To Do availability in Outlook on the web
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft To Do will be available from the Outlook on the web app launcher. To Do will replace the tasks module currently available. After this change, you will see To Do in the app launcher instead of tasks.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft To Do: Microsoft To Do availability in Outlook on the web
OldVersion.description: Microsoft To Do will be available from the Outlook on the web app launcher. To Do will replace the tasks module currently available. After this change, you will see To Do in the app launcher instead of tasks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Receive coaching on your writing in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: The Copilot context menu will include an option for getting AI-generated coaching. Copilot will review the writing and offer suggestions for high-impact areas, such as logical structure, flow, and tone.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Receive coaching on your writing in Copilot in Word
OldVersion.description: The Copilot context menu will include an option for getting AI-generated coaching. Copilot will review the writing and offer suggestions for high-impact areas, such as logical structure, flow, and tone.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Optimized hover actions in the message list on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The hover actions in the message list will be modified to be more space efficient and minimize unnecessary mouse travel. This change primarily affects users with the multicolumn (wider) message list. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Optimized hover actions in the message list on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: The hover actions in the message list will be modified to be more space efficient and minimize unnecessary mouse travel. This change primarily affects users with the multicolumn (wider) message list. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in channel
CurrentVersion.description: The Files tab in channels is now "Shared". In addition to files that are currently shown from document library, new experience will also show all the files and links shared in the channel conversations. This makes it easier to find content all in one place.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in channel
OldVersion.description: he Files tab in channels is now "Shared". In addition to files that are currently shown from document library, new experience will also show all the files and links shared in the channel conversations. This makes it easier to find content all in one place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Editing and viewing community 'info' revamped
CurrentVersion.description: Revamp the community "info" experience to be in line with the existing Engage user patterns. Editing the info, will now be available within the settings experience. Users can read the info from the "About" section additionally.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Editing and viewing community 'info' revamped
OldVersion.description: Revamp the community "info" experience to be in line with the existing Engage user patterns. Editing the info, will now be available within the settings experience. Users can read the info from the "About" section additionally.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users can view app ratings before installing apps or agents
CurrentVersion.description: We have improved user options for sharing a link for a Teams app or a Microsoft 365 Copilot agent in a chat. Links to apps and agents will have a new preview card with user ratings for users to consider before installing apps or agents in Teams and clear actions like Add (which installs the app or agent) and View detail. A Microsoft 365 Copilot license is not required to share Copilot agent links but may be required to install and use the agent.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Availability of 'Add' and 'view details' buttons on unfurled links.
OldVersion.description: Option to 'Add' and 'View details' for an app will appear in the unfurled links for seamless installation of apps & agents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- MacOS parity – Full file evidence
CurrentVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- MacOS parity – Full file evidence
OldVersion.description: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Real-Time Text in Teams Meetings and Calls
CurrentVersion.description: Real-Time Text (RTT) lets participants type in the meeting while others’ speech is transcribed in real time. Whether for accessibility reasons or simply a preference to chime in via text, RTT ensures seamless, instant communication for everyone. It enables effective collaboration for all users, including those who prefer typing over speaking, and can be especially useful in situations where speaking is difficult or not possible.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage - Create articles and questions more easily with the updated "Create new" button.
CurrentVersion.description:
We are excited to announce the addition of two post creation options—Article and Question—to the centralized creation button in Viva Engage for premium users. Starting April 2025, a Viva Engage premium licensed user will be able to create an article or a question post type directly by clicking on the "Create new" button, easing the process of creation of these post types, while also helping users discover them quicker. Kindly note that this roll out does not entail adding new types of content creation, but brings forth a unified and easier way to create these post types when a user is already licensed to use them.
By 'Viva Engage premium licensed user', we mean this feature is available for users licensed to the Microsoft Viva Suite or the Microsoft Viva Employee Communications and Communities Suite.
